page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT IN WELWYN
page.content: Formed in Sept 1974 by Ann Lawson with 17 members of the Wives Organisa- tion of St Mary's Church, Welwyn Wives Choir is nearly 40 strong, still with several founder members. Now known as the Welwyn Ladies Choir, it has entered, with a great deal of success, many local Music Festivals, and has given concerts nearly every year, the proceeds alwys being given to a charity. Over the past few years the Welwyn Husbands and Friends have sung with the Ladies at Christmas concerts and others where male voices are required. The Welwyn Wailers were formed in 1973 as an informal group presenting occasional entertainments of local interest in aid of mainly local charities. A special fund known as the Welwyn Deprived Families Fund was set up in 1975 to help local families.
